hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read f; case "$f" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.css|*.json|*.yml|*.yaml|*.md|*.html|*.vue|*.svelte) npx prettier --config "$HOME/.prettierrc.json" --write "$f" ;; *.c|*.cc|*.cpp|*.h|*.hpp) clang-format -i -style=file "$f" ;; *.lua) stylua --config-path "$HOME/.config/nvim/stylua.toml" "$f" ;; esac; }
